Monsoon Spa Therapies @ Shvasa Spa, Hyatt Regency Gurgaon
This Monsoon, Shasva Spa at Hyatt Regency Gurgaon brings an experience so soothing and so peaceful, that it will liven up your soul while beating the monsoon blues. Shasva spa offers an array of rejuvenating therapies ranging from massages, treatments, body scrubs to wraps to combat the effects of the humidity on your skin.
For Monsoon our offering includes Abhyanga, a traditional Indian massage from head to toe, using warm medicated oils, with a combination of soothing and symmetrical long strokes that regulate the circulatory and nervous systems of the body. It helps to restore and repair worn out tissues, improving blood circulation and prevents early aging.
Another popular monsoon therapy on offer is Sanative, which soothes damaged skin by the application of enriched papaya extract enzyme over the entire body to cleanse and detoxify. Elimination of toxins and free radicals helps to improvise skin texture and improve skin radiance. A warm shower is followed by application of an age-defying emulsion that hydrates and makes the skin feel smooth and revived.
Visit Shasva spa and indulge in complete bliss by pampering yourself with rejuvenating spa treatments this monsoon only at Hyatt Regency Gurgaon.
